title: Michael Burry : 股市幾個月後崩潰

replies.msg:
媲美索羅斯, 一代沽神戰績:-
1. 2000年沽空科網股爆破, 一鳴驚人
2. 2008 The big Shorts, 唔使多講
3. 2021 GME, 夾死其他沽空大鱷, 賺到嘔, 一統沽空江湖

Now, he said:-
"We are in a blow-off top in all things," Burry continued, referring to a chart pattern that shows a steep increase in an asset's price and trading volume, followed by a rapid price decline.

"Markets have now bubbled over in a dangerous way," he said in an earlier tweet.

Burry hinted in yet another tweet that he expected a market crash in the coming months. He linked to "When The Levee Breaks," a Led Zeppelin song, and said, "This time we'll play it at the beginning, not at the end."
